id: About Me Page & Resume for Notion
name: About Me Page & Resume for Notion
description: Design an “about me” page in Notion with this minimal page layout. Use this page to help introduce yourself to readers, potential employers, clients, customers, etc.Strip Notion down to the essentials, and make use of all native blocks. No third-party widgets are used. This template includes 2 page layouts. One for a landing page and another for a resume. Here are all the page elements inside: Links, Quote, Introduction, Highlights, Essay database, Project roadmap, and Resume template
